price: Cuando se presentaron ante él dijeron: "¡Paz!" Y [Abraham] respondió: "¡Paz!, gente desconocida".
arabic: إِذۡ دَخَلُواْ عَلَيۡهِ فَقَالُواْ سَلَٰمٗاۖ قَالَ سَلَٰمٞ قَوۡمٞ مُّنكَرُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: idh dakhalū ʿalayhi faqālū salāman qāla salāmun qawmun munkarūna
